TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SoapExtension extends System.Object

summary.span: XML Web Service 的 SOAP 擴充的基底類別，使用 ASP.NET 所建立的。

span.span: The base class for SOAP extensions for XML Web services created using ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 允許 SOAP 相關的基礎結構建置透過擴充性機制。ASP.NET allows a SOAP-related infrastructure to be built by means of an extensibility mechanism. ASP.NET SOAP 延伸模組架構為中心，以便檢查或修改訊息用戶端或伺服器上處理的訊息中的特定階段擴充功能。The ASP.NET SOAP extension architecture revolves around an extension that can inspect or modify a message at specific stages in message processing on either the client or the server. ASP.NET SOAP 延伸模組衍生自類別。ASP.NET SOAP extensions derive from the class. 和方法可提供替代機制，可用於初始化 SOAP 擴充功能來增強效能。The and methods provide alternative mechanisms for initializing the SOAP extension to enhance performance. 此方法會呼叫每個階段中定義為大部分的 SOAP 擴充功能的核心，允許 SOAP 擴充功能來執行該特定的 SOAP 擴充功能所需的行為。 is the heart of most SOAP extensions, as the method is called at each stage defined in , allowing the SOAP extension to perform the desired behavior of that specific SOAP extension. 針對需要 SOAP 擴充功能來修改 SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應讓您有機會接收提議的資料，以跨線路傳送。For SOAP extensions that need to modify the SOAP request or SOAP response, provides an opportunity to receive the proposed data to be sent across the wire. ## Examples 下列`TraceExtension`SOAP 延伸模組會輸出 SOAP 要求至指定的檔案套用至 XML Web 服務方法時的 SOAP 回應。The following `TraceExtension` SOAP extension outputs the SOAP request and SOAP response to a specified file when applied to an XML Web service method. 如果下列 SOAP 擴充功能安裝到執行 XML Web service，ASPNET 使用者帳戶必須在其中寫入記錄檔的目錄的寫入權限。If the following SOAP extension is installed to run with an XML Web service, the ASPNET user account must have permission to write to the directory in which the log file is written. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapExtension Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapExtension Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapExtension Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IO.Stream ChainStream(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

param.name: stream
param.span: 記憶體緩衝區，包含 SOAP 要求或回應。

span.span: A memory buffer containing the SOAP request or response.

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，允許對包含 SOAP 要求或回應之記憶體緩衝區的 SOAP 擴充存取。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a SOAP extension access to the memory buffer containing the SOAP request or response.

returns.span: ，表示這個 SOAP 擴充可以修改的新記憶體緩衝區。

span.span: A representing a new memory buffer that this SOAP extension can modify.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可確保具有最高優先順序的 SOAP 擴充功能，可以修改 SOAP 訊息傳送，或透過網路傳回最接近的實際資料。 ensures that SOAP extensions with the highest priority can modify the actual data closest to the SOAP message sent or returned over the wire. SOAP 延伸模組應該儲存參考傳入和從傳回。SOAP extensions should save references of the passed into and the returned from . 如果 SOAP 延伸模組設定為 XML Web 服務方法，以執行傳入包含已序列化的 SOAP 要求，在 。If the SOAP extension is configured to run with a XML Web service method, the passed into contains the serialized SOAP request at the . 同樣地，傳回從參考時序列化，就會發生，因此會包含已序列化的 SOAP 回應中會寫入 。Similarily, the reference returned from is written into when the serialization occurs and thus contains the serialized SOAP response in the . ## Examples 下列範例會將儲存兩者傳入和從傳回成員變數中`oldStream`和`newStream`分別。The following example saves both the passed into and the returned from in the member variables `oldStream` and `newStream`, respectively. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapExtension.ChainStream Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.ChainStream Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapExtension.ChainStream Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.ChainStream Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapExtension.ChainStream Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.ChainStream Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，允許 SOAP 擴充耗用一次效能來初始化 XML Web Service 方法所特有的資料。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a SOAP extension to initialize data specific to an XML Web service method at a one time performance cost.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetInitializer(class System.Type serviceType) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetInitializer (serviceType As Type) As Object

param.name: serviceType
param.span: 類別的型別，此類別實作 SOAP 擴充所套用到的 XML Web Service。

span.span: The type of the class implementing the XML Web service to which the SOAP extension is applied.

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，允許 SOAP 擴充耗用一次效能來初始化實作 XML Web Service 之類別所特有的資料。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a SOAP extension to initialize data specific to a class implementing an XML Web service at a one time performance cost.

returns.span: SOAP 擴充為快取所初始化的 。

span.span: The that the SOAP extension initializes for caching.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多載，取得由呼叫 ASP.NET 取決於 SOAP 延伸模組指定的方式。The overload of that gets called by ASP.NET depends on how the SOAP extension was specified. 有兩種方法指定的 SOAP 擴充功能：There are two methods for specifying a SOAP extension: - 套用自訂屬性，衍生自，個別的 XML Web 服務方法。Apply a custom attribute, deriving from , to the individual XML Web service method. - 在 web.config 或 app.config 組態檔中加入的參考。Add a reference in either the web.config or app.config configuration files. 如果您加入組態檔的其中一個的參考，SOAP 延伸模組會執行該設定檔的範圍內的所有 XML Web 服務。If you add a reference to one of the configuration files, the SOAP extension runs for all XML Web services within the scope of that configuration file. 指定時，SOAP 延伸模組所參考的組態檔，會叫用 ASP.NET傳入的多載。When specifying, a SOAP extension by referencing a configuration file, ASP.NET invokes the overload that passes in a . 藉由套用自訂屬性指定擴充功能，會叫用 ASP.NET中傳遞之和。When specifying an extension by applying a custom attribute, ASP.NET invokes the that passes in a and a . 如需將 SOAP 擴充功能加入至組態檔的詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f0d71bc-8faa-4730-b500-2a6c7b5d4f6b)。For details on adding SOAP extensions to a configuration file, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f0d71bc-8faa-4730-b500-2a6c7b5d4f6b). ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何其中一個可以節省 SOAP 延伸模組特定的資料每個 XML Web 服務為基礎。The following code demonstrates how one can save SOAP extension specific data on a per XML Web service basis. 如果 SOAP 延伸模組已設定使用組態檔，而不屬性，SOAP 延伸模組可以儲存資料以 SOAP 擴充功能套用到每個類別。If the SOAP extension is configured using a configuration file instead of an attribute, the SOAP extension can store data for each class to which the SOAP extension is applied. 此範例會儲存在用來記錄傳送到快取實作 XML Web 服務的類別名稱為基礎的 XML Web 服務方法的 SOAP 訊息的檔案名稱。This example saves the name of a file in which to log the SOAP messages sent to and from the XML Web service method based on the name of the class implementing the XML Web service into the cache. 這個程式碼範例是 TraceExtension SOAP 延伸模組中可找到完整的程式碼範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a full code example for a TraceExtension SOAP extension that can be found in the class overview. [!code-cpp[SoapExtension.GetInitializer-Type#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapExtension.GetInitializer-Type/CPP/traceextension.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapExtension.GetInitializer-Type#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapExtension.GetInitializer-Type/CS/traceextension.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapExtension.GetInitializer-Type#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapExtension.GetInitializer-Type/VB/traceextension.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object GetInitializer (System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo methodInfo, System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtensionAttribute attribute);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetInitializer(class System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo methodInfo, class System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtensionAttribute attribute) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetInitializer (methodInfo As LogicalMethodInfo, attribute As SoapExtensionAttribute) As Object

param.name: methodInfo
param.span: ，表示 SOAP 擴充所套用到的 XML Web Service 方法的特定函式原型。

span.span: A representing the specific function prototype for the XML Web service method to which the SOAP extension is applied.

param.name: attribute
param.span: ，被套用於 XML Web Service 方法。

span.span: The applied to the XML Web service method.

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，允許 SOAP 擴充耗用一次效能，使用套用至 XML Web Service 方法的屬性來初始化 XML Web Service 方法所特有的資料。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a SOAP extension to initialize data specific to an XML Web service method using an attribute applied to the XML Web service method at a one time performance cost.

returns.span: SOAP 擴充為快取所初始化的 。

span.span: The that the SOAP extension initializes for caching.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 SOAP 延伸模組設定使用組態檔，請參閱多載會接受。If the SOAP extension is configured using a configuration file see the overload that accepts a . SOAP 延伸模組有三個機會來初始化資料，而且它們都有不同的用途：A SOAP extension has three opportunities to initialize data and they all have different purposes: - 每次具現化的 SOAP 擴充功能，和通常用來初始化成員變數的類別建構函式會呼叫類別建構函式。Class constructor - The class constructor is called every time a SOAP extension is instantiated and is typically used to initialize member variables. - - 不過，會呼叫一次，第一次的 SOAP 要求對 XML Web 服務方法。 - , however, is called just once, the first time a SOAP request is made to an XML Web services method. 如果自訂屬性套用至 XML Web service 方法，叫用方法。If a custom attribute is applied to the XML Web service method, the method is invoked. 這可讓 SOAP 擴充功能來詢問原型資訊或要由衍生自類別傳遞延伸模組的特定資料的存取 XML Web 服務方法的。This allows the SOAP extension to interrogate the of an XML Web service method for prototype information or to access extension-specific data passed by a class deriving from . 傳回值是由 ASP.NET 快取及傳遞至後續方法。The return value is cached by ASP.NET and passed into subsequent methods. 因此，在完成初始化基本上會封裝成一次性的效能叫用。Therefore, initialization done in is encapsulated essentially into a one-time performance hit. - - 每次 SOAP 要求對 XML Web service 方法，但類別建構函式的優勢在於，稱為中初始化傳遞給它。 - is called every time a SOAP request is made to an XML Web service method, but has an advantage over the class constructor, in that the initialized in is passed to it. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何取得 SOAP 延伸模組的特定資料中使用的類別，衍生自傳遞，接著快取中的資料和。The following code demonstrates how you can obtain SOAP extension-specific data passed in using a class that derives from , and then cache that data in . 這個程式碼範例是完整的程式碼範例的一部分`TraceExtension`SOAP 延伸模組中可找到類別概觀。This code example is part of a full code example for a `TraceExtension` SOAP extension that can be found in the class overview. 這個程式碼範例依賴`TraceExtensionAttribute`傳入`attribute`參數。This code example relies on a `TraceExtensionAttribute` being passed into the `attribute` parameter. 在完整的程式碼範例中，`TraceExtensionAttribute`衍生自，並將`Filename`屬性，這是什麼儲存快取中。In the full code example, `TraceExtensionAttribute` derives from and adds a `Filename` property, which is what stores in the cache. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapExtension.GetInitializer Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.GetInitializer Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapExtension.GetInitializer Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.GetInitializer Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapExtension.GetInitializer Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.GetInitializer Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public MustOverride Sub Initialize (initializer As Object)

param.name: initializer
param.span: ，自 ASP.NET 所快取的 傳回。

span.span: The returned from cached by ASP.NET.

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，允許 SOAP 擴充使用 方法中快取的資料來初始化其本身。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a SOAP extension to initialize itself using the data cached in the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 延伸模組有三個機會來初始化資料，而且它們都有不同的用途：A SOAP extension has three opportunities to initialize data and they all have different purposes: - 每次具現化的 SOAP 擴充功能，和通常用來初始化成員變數的類別建構函式會呼叫類別建構函式。Class constructor - The class constructor is called every time a SOAP extension is instantiated and is typically used to initialize member variables. - - 不過，會呼叫一次，第一次的 SOAP 要求對 XML Web 服務方法。 - , however, is called just once, the first time a SOAP request is made to an XML Web services method. 如果自訂屬性套用至 XML Web service 方法，叫用方法。If a custom attribute is applied to the XML Web service method, the method is invoked. 這可讓 SOAP 擴充功能來詢問原型資訊或要由衍生自類別傳遞延伸模組的特定資料的存取 XML Web 服務方法的。This allows the SOAP extension to interrogate the of an XML Web service method for prototype information or to access extension-specific data passed by a class deriving from . 傳回值是由 ASP.NET 快取及傳遞至後續方法。The return value is cached by ASP.NET and passed into subsequent methods. 因此，在完成初始化基本上會封裝成一次性的效能叫用。Therefore, initialization done in is encapsulated essentially into a one-time performance hit. - - 每次 SOAP 要求對 XML Web service 方法，但類別建構函式的優勢在於，稱為中初始化傳遞給它。 - is called every time a SOAP request is made to an XML Web service method, but has an advantage over the class constructor, in that the initialized in is passed to it. - > [!NOTE] > 您也可以新增的 SOAP 擴充功能，而不需從衍生使用[ \ 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a373a98-6d82-4f8d-a6fc-2996da3fd54c)組態檔中。You can also add a SOAP extension without deriving from by using the [\ Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a373a98-6d82-4f8d-a6fc-2996da3fd54c) in a configuration file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ \ 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a373a98-6d82-4f8d-a6fc-2996da3fd54c)和[SOAP 訊息修改使用 SOAP 擴充功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97d81ace-95e7-4acc-ae39-9692a0021e95)。For details, see [\ Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a373a98-6d82-4f8d-a6fc-2996da3fd54c) and [SOAP Message Modification Using SOAP Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97d81ace-95e7-4acc-ae39-9692a0021e95). - ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用快取期間的資料方法。The following example demonstrates how you can use the data cached during the method. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapExtension.Initialize Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.Initialize Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapExtension.Initialize Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.Initialize Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapExtension.Initialize Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.Initialize Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ProcessMessage(class System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage message) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub ProcessMessage (message As SoapMessage)

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，允許 SOAP 擴充接收要在每個 處理的 。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a SOAP extension to receive a to process at each .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有呼叫套用至使用 ASP.NET 和其用戶端建立這兩個 XML Web 服務的 SOAP 擴充功能的階段。 is called at all stages for SOAP extensions applied to both XML Web services created using ASP.NET and their clients. 在每個，衍生自類別的執行個體傳遞至。At each , an instance of a class deriving from is passed to . 如果 XML Web 服務用戶端上執行的 SOAP 擴充功能則物件傳遞至，否則為傳入的物件。If the SOAP extension is running on the XML Web service client, then a object is passed into ; otherwise a object is passed in. ## Examples 下列範例是記錄 SOAP 要求和 SOAP 回應的 SOAP 擴充功能的一部分。The following example is the portion of a SOAP extension that logs SOAP requests and SOAP responses. 記錄由在 ，SOAP 擴充功能存取透過網路傳送。By logging the at the , the SOAP extension accesses the to be sent over the wire. 如果 SOAP 擴充功能會套用至使用 ASP.NET 建立 XML Web 服務方法則包含 XML Web service 方法的 SOAP 回應。If the SOAP extension is applied to an XML Web service method created using ASP.NET, then the contains the SOAP response from the XML Web service method. 如果 SOAP 擴充功能會套用至 XML Web 服務用戶端包含 XML Web 服務方法的 SOAP 要求。If the SOAP extension is applied to an XML Web service client, the contains the SOAP request to an XML Web service method. 典型的 SoapExtension.ProcessMessage 範例 #1Classic SoapExtension.ProcessMessage Example#1
